title: Does anyone else keep a list of their champs and skins??
body:
Chatting with my mate while looking over the internet trying to find a website that lets me know how much money iv wasted. I mean invested in this game haha. (if anyone knows  a decent working one, it would be awesome if you passed on the information.) But just thought if there was anyone else who kept a list if you'd like to share. Here's mine currently but still waiting on 6 or 7 mystery skins from riot for the current event.

Also is there anywhere with the complete list of skins in game?
PS. Had to edit it swapped mystery gifts with my friend this morning. He got Imperial Zin and Groovy Zilean.. I got Pulsefire Ezreal and Whistler Village Twitch. Safe to say <<< Happy collector.

replies.body: Meanwhile I think $200 is a lot.

Ive done this before, You just need to log a ticket with Rito asking how much you have spent.. 

Normally takes a day for them to respond.

I got mine back and was around $750..  

Got a mate that was $1500+

Iv spent $250 this weekend hahaha But before they allowed us to buy mystery skins for ourselves I used to put RP on friends accounts and spam mystery gifts as well haha. I think I'm in the range of around $3000-$4000.

I bought 60 mystery skins/chests for the current mystery skin event, 40 for the last one and bought a few skins now and then so i prob have about 120ish i think (plus 10 i m waiting for from riot)
Theres a site to check how mny skins you own for the korean server but not sure if theres on for oce
Yeah I'm at around 360ish now I think. Got annoyed with the game and started collecting haha.
It'd be awesome if Riot mdae it easier
